Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Thanks to perhaps the most indelible character in Akira Kurosawa's oeuvre, Yojimbo surpassed even Seven Samurai in popularity when it was released. The masterless samurai Sanjuro, who slyly manipulates two warring clans to his advantage."]
{'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, Black & White, Dolby, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Takashi Shimura, Eijir Tno, Akira Kurosawa, Yko Tsukasa, Kamatari Fujiwara, Yosuke Natsuki, Ikio Sawamura, Hiroshi Tachikawa, Tatsuya Nakadai, Seizabur Kawazu, Ryz Kikushima, Toshir Mifune, Daisuke Kat, Isuzu YamadaTakashi Shimura, Eijir Tno, Akira Kurosawa, Yko Tsukasa, Kamatari Fujiwara, Yosuke Natsuki, Ikio Sawamura, Hiroshi Tachikawa, Tatsuya Nakadai, Seizabur Kawazu, Ryz Kikushima, Toshir Mifune, Daisuke Kat, Isuzu Yamada  See more', 'Language': 'Japanese', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 15 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.92 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6639479', 'Director': 'Akira Kurosawa', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, Black & White, Dolby, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 15 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 23, 2010', 'Actors': 'Toshir Mifune, Eijir Tno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yko Tsukasa, Isuzu Yamada', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Writers': 'Akira Kurosawa, Ryz Kikushima', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}

Kurosawa at his best
A Night to Remember (The Criterion Collection) [Blu-ray]
Kenneth More  (Actor),     Honor Blackman  (Actor),     Roy Ward Baker  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['On April 14, 1912, just before midnight, the unsinkable Titanic struck an iceberg. In less than three hours, it had plunged to the bottom of the sea, taking with it more than 1,500 of its 2,200 passengers. In his unforgettable rendering of Walter Lord’s book of the same name,', 'A Night to Remember', ', the acclaimed British director Roy Ward Baker (', 'Don’t Bother to Knock', ') depicts with sensitivity, awe, and a fine sense of tragedy the ship’s final hours. Featuring remarkably restrained performances,', 'A Night to Remember', 'is cinema’s subtlest, finest dramatization of this monumental twentieth-century catastrophe.']
{'Genre': 'Drama, Documentary/Biography', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Roy Ward Baker, Kenneth More, David McCallum, Tucker McGuire, Honor Blackman, Michael Goodliffe', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CRRN2133BR', 'Director': 'Roy Ward Baker', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 27, 2012', 'Actors': 'Kenneth More, Honor Blackman, Michael Goodliffe, David McCallum, Tucker McGuire', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Still the beat film dramatization of the sinking of the RMS Titanic. Yes it doesn’t have the technical details of the final moment right (ship breaking up not confirmed until the reck was found well after this movie was made), but it’s a far better film than Titanic.
Best Titanic Dramatization
Star Trek Discovery - Season 3
Sonequa Martin-Green  (Actor),     Doug Jones  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
['Debuting in 2017, this exciting entry in the ever-popular sci-fi franchise takes place approximately 10 years before the original "Star Trek" series. Imprisoned for mutiny, disgraced Starfleet officer Michael Burnham (Sonequa Martin-Green) gets a chance at redemption when she\'s recruited to join the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery on an important interstellar mission. Doug Jones, Shazad Latif, Anthony Rapp, Mary Wiseman, Jason Isaacs also star.13 episodes on 4 discs. 11 hrs. Widescreen; Soundtrack: English.']
{'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television, Television', 'Format': 'Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Sonequa Martin-Green, Mary Wiseman, Anthony Rapp, Doug Jones', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.43 x 6.81 x 0.75 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Subtitled', 'Run time': '11 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 20, 2021', 'Actors': 'Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Mary Wiseman, Anthony Rapp', 'Studio': 'Paramount Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Clearly the showrunners and writers got tired of having to stick with the TOS timeline since they moved Season 3 to a very different spot than Seasons 1-2. Still enjoyable with references to prior Star Trek series though.
Fun Third Season
Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Complete Series [Blu-ray]
Hideaki ANNO  (Director, Writer),     Casey Mongillo  (Actor),     Carrie Keranen  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
['"One of the most powerful, visually stunning, intellectually probing anime in the medium\'s history" – Allegra Frank, VoxIn 2015, Tokyo-3 is under attack from "Angels," extraordinary beings that possess various special abilities. Multipurpose Humanoid Decisive Weapon, Evangelion is the only method to counter these Angels, and Shinji Ikari is chosen as its pilot. The battle for the fate of humankind has begun. Exactly what are the Angels? What is destined for the young pilots? And what will become of humanity?Presented on Blu-ray for the first time in North America, this groundbreaking, action-packed series from creator Hideaki ANNO has been hailed as one of the most important anime series of all time – a remarkable fusion of genres, and a powerful examination of the relationship between man and machine.The NEON GENESIS EVANGELION Standard Edition is an essential five-disc set that contains over five hours of bonus features, including animatics, TV commercials, music videos, and more.This set includes the original twenty-six episode television series, NEON GENESIS EVANGELION, as well as the films EVANGELION:DEATH (TRUE)', '2', 'and THE END OF EVANGELION.Please Note: The international re-release of NEON GENESIS EVANGELION does not contain "FLY ME TO THE MOON."']
{'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'DVD', 'Contributor': 'Carrie Keranen, Casey Mongillo, Clifford Chapin, Stephanie McKeon, Ryan Bartley, Hideaki ANNO', 'Language': 'Japanese', 'Number Of Discs': '5', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 0.5 inches; 5.28 Ounces', 'Director': 'Hideaki ANNO', 'Media Format': 'DVD', 'Run time': '13 hours', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2021', 'Actors': 'Casey Mongillo, Carrie Keranen, Stephanie McKeon, Ryan Bartley, Clifford Chapin', 'Studio': 'SHOUT! FACTORY', 'Writers': 'Hideaki ANNO', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '5'}
Neon Genesis is my favorite anime of all time. I've had a set of DVDs since I was a kid and am happy to now have the Blu Rays. The one drawback is this is the new dub done for Netflix not the original dub, so I guess I have to keep that DVD set around longer. If you want the original dub on Blu Ray you need to find the Special Edition set, which is obviously a lot more expensive. Still nice to have I just wish it had the better English dub.
My favorite anime
South Park: The Complete Twenty-Second Season
Matt Stone  (Actor),     Trey Parker  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
['Kids say the foulest-and funniest-things in Comedy Central\'s off-the-wall, "adults only" animated series that quickly became a cult favorite. Join good-natured Stan Marsh, brainy Kyle Broflovski, big-boned miscreant Eric Cartman, and born-to-die Kenny McCormick as they struggle with grade-school life in the twisted town of South Park, Colorado. Voiced by series creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone, and April Stewart, Mary Kay Bergman, Isaac Hayes, Mona Marshall.10 episodes on 2 discs. 3 3/4 hrs. Widescreen; Soundtracks: English Dolby Digital 5.1, Dolby Digital stereo; Subtitles: English (SDH).']

Superman: The Complete Animated Series (Blu-ray)
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray
['The creative team behind the Emmy® Award-winning Batman: The Animated Series chronicles the adventures of Superman, the legendary Super Hero. As the planet Krypton is destroyed, its leader, Jor-El, secures his infant son, Kal-El, in a rocket that will transport him to Earth. There, a young Clark Kent (voiced by TIM DALY) discovers the truth about his interplanetary heritage. Upon reaching adulthood, he assumes the identity of Superman, the Man of Steel, in the city of Metropolis, battling the forces of villainy and continuing his quest for "Truth, Justice and the American way." Fly with Superman in this complete collection of adventures.', ']]>']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

**Content Preferences:**
- The user maintains a strong passion for classic cinema, especially Japanese film, and continues to admire Akira Kurosawa. Their interests have recently broadened to encompass historical dramas and adventurous narratives, highlighting a keen appreciation for both classic and contemporary storytelling.
- The user has shown an increasing interest in modern adaptations and superhero genres, suggesting a growing enthusiasm for diverse cinematic experiences while retaining a focus on narrative complexity.

**Format and Quality:**
- The user consistently opts for high-quality formats, particularly Blu-ray and 4K Ultra HD, avidly seeking releases that offer exceptional audio-visual quality and valuable special features. Their focus on well-produced content is evident through ratings and reviews.

**Rating Behavior:**
- Their rating behavior remains notably high, frequently awarding 5-star ratings. Recent reviews emphasize satisfaction with both classic and newer content, reinforcing a preference for engaging narratives and production quality.

**Community Engagement:**
- The user actively participates in recommending films and discussing their appreciation for meticulous storytelling, demonstrating an openness to exploring new interpretations of established themes and a willingness to engage in comprehensive discussions within their community.

Overall, this user exemplifies refined cinematic tastes, integrating an appreciation for quality adaptations and dynamic storytelling across both classic and contemporary film landscapes.
